headline: Unifor welcomes third shift announcements by GM and Stellantis
summary: Today, Unifor confirmed plans that Stellantis will return the Windsor Assembly Plant to a three shift operation in the first quarter of 2026 and that General Motors has delayed plans to cut the third shift at the Oshawa Assembly Plant until at least January 30, 2026, validating the union's efforts to pressure government and corporate decision-makers to protect Canadian jobs in the country's vitally important auto sector.

headline: Pilot, General Motors and EVgo Open Over 200 Fast Charging Locations to Power Nationwide EV Travel
summary: KNOXVILLE, Tenn., September 09, 2025--Pilot Company (Pilot), General Motors (NYSE: GM) and EVgo Inc. (NASDAQ: EVGO) today announced their collaborative network now reaches more than 200 locations across nearly 40 states. In just over two years, the companies have worked together to bridge charging gaps by deploying nearly 850 new electric vehicle (EV) fast charging stalls across America. headline: Should You Reconsider GM’s Value After Tennessee EV Production Cuts?
summary: If you’re poring over your portfolio and wondering if General Motors deserves a bigger spot in it, you’re certainly not alone. Investors have watched GM climb a steady 93.1% over the last five years, with another 24.1% gain just in the past year. Even the past month has treated shareholders well, with the stock up 8.7%, despite a slight dip of 0.7% this past week. These moves tell a bigger story about shifting expectations and changing risks for the automaker. Let’s talk about what’s under...

headline: V2X, General Motors, and U.S. Army Celebrate 11 Years of the Shifting Gears Automotive Technician Training Program
summary: This month marks the 11th anniversary of the Shifting Gears Automotive Technician Training Program, a collaborative initiative between V2X Inc. (NYSE: VVX), General Motors (GM), and the U.S. Army at Fort Hood. For more than a decade, this innovative program has provided transitioning service members with valuable hands-on training and career pathways as certified GM service technicians.

headline: 2 S&P 500 Stocks to Consider Right Now and 1 Facing Headwinds
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
